page.title: 17A Local Worry
page.content: The Motorway,M 25 ,which is the most recent motorway to be built, and which 'rings' London, is now complete except for the stretch from Hunton Bridge to South Mimms,which runs right through our area. Near Bricket Wood,there is to be a huge intersection;the Government bought too much land,and there are various proposals for its use.One was as a hotel and shopping complex,another was as warehouses. If it is developed,it will be the most valuable piece of land in Europe --so it is nick-named "The Golden Triangle". Local people in Bricket Wood, think it should go back to being farmed and are worried by the thought of even more traffic comming into the area.
